items.sentence: The TGV goes faster than any other train in the world.
It was yesterday that I saw Tom in the park with Mary.
Smell this milk. Do you think it\'s still OK to drink?
The President is capable of handling the difficulties.
It\'s worth a lot more than what Tom is asking for it.
Tom didn\'t need to tell me that. I already knew that.
Tom didn\'t really expect Mary to answer his question.
Tom didn\'t really have to come into the office today.
Tom didn\'t say much about what happened last weekend.
Tom hasn\'t bought a new pair of shoes in three years.
Moderate exercise stimulates the circulation of blood.
Tom isn\'t as easy to get along with as he used to be.
Tom and I are the only ones who didn\'t pass the test.
Tom and I both know Mary wasn\'t the one who did that.
Tom wrote an article about it in the school newspaper.
We go out and have dinner together every now and then.
I was surprised when I found out Tom had a motorcycle.
I was surprised when Tom told me he wanted to do that.
I\'ll be glad when they\'re done building that bridge.
Tom got tired of waiting for Mary, so he went on home.
